channel.title: Ads
channel.description: There used to be a moparscape that did the acual game, is there something somewhere thats like that but just the real game without the ads because my computer is shit and when I'm on my f2p acount I cant pk or anything cus some ad comes up and I get horrible lag and my computer freezes. I know its agienst the rules or whatever but is there anything that can get rid of the ads in f2p cus I cant play sometimes.

item.title: Ads
item.dc:creator: @bobperson bobperson
item.description:
@bobperson wrote:

Realy? I didnt know that thanks.

Read full topic
